steps.subject: Your Getting Started Guide + Kickoff Call Reminder
steps.preheader: Everything you need to know for a successful launch

content.body:
It's {{onboarding_specialist_name}}, your dedicated onboarding specialist!

I wanted to send you a comprehensive getting started guide to help you hit the ground running.

KICKOFF CALL REMINDER:
If you haven't already, please schedule your kickoff call:
{{kickoff_calendar_link}}

This 30-minute call is crucial for:
- Understanding your business goals
- Configuring your AI Voice Agent
- Setting up integrations
- Answering your questions

GETTING STARTED GUIDE:

STEP 1: LOG INTO YOUR DASHBOARD
URL: {{dashboard_link}}
Username: {{contact.email}}
Password: Check your email for temporary password

STEP 2: EXPLORE YOUR DASHBOARD
- Pipeline view: See all your leads
- Conversations: Review AI call transcripts
- Analytics: Track performance metrics
- Settings: Configure your preferences

STEP 3: REVIEW YOUR AI AGENT PROFILE
We've pre-configured based on your demo, but you can customize:
- Agent name and personality
- Business hours
- Qualifying questions
- Appointment types
- Routing rules

STEP 4: CONNECT YOUR TOOLS
We'll help you integrate:
- Phone system (we'll provide one if needed)
- Calendar (Google, Outlook, iCloud)
- CRM (or use ours)
- Email
- SMS

STEP 5: PREPARE YOUR SCRIPTS
Think about:
- How you currently greet callers
- Your qualifying questions
- Common objections and responses
- Your call-to-action

We'll refine these together during onboarding.

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS:

Q: When will my AI agent go live?
A: 48 hours from your kickoff call.

Q: Can I test it before going live?
A: Absolutely! We'll do extensive testing together.

Q: What if I need to make changes?
A: Unlimited changes and optimization included. We're here to perfect it.

Q: Will you train my team?
A: Yes! We provide training for everyone who'll interact with the system.

Q: What if I have technical issues?
A: 24/7 support via email, phone, and live chat.

PREPARATION CHECKLIST:
